#### Contact

The City of Commerce

1119 Alamo Street

Phone: 903-886-1100

Utilities: Monday - Friday, 8 a.m. - 4 p.m.

Municipal Court: Monday - Thursday, 8:15 a.m. - 4 p.m.

City Hall: Monday - Friday, 8 a.m. - 4:45 p.m.
